title: J.D. goes hunting
brief_description: The story of an American’s hunting holiday in New Zealand’s Southern Alps. Authentic fishing and hunting scenes are set in magnificent mountain and forest scenery, showing the abundant bird and animal life.
description: The story of an American’s hunting holiday in New Zealand’s Southern Alps. Authentic fishing and hunting scenes are set in magnificent mountain and forest scenery, showing the abundant bird and animal life.
